Articles.Content:
how to install:

[list type=decimal]

[li]make new directory in ksp\parts\ named mod_braun_parachute [/li]

[li]copy ksp\parts\parachute_single to mod_braun_parachute[/li]

[li]replace part.cfg in mod_braun_parachute with the one from this thread

trouble:

despite yanking up drag to a whopping 160, even single parts smack down like a fly on your windshield.
Increase the mass of the chute. It seems weird, but the parachute works better the heavier it is.
Seems, that drag coefficient is multiplied by mass. Or the drag is being added as acceleration that results in the same
